programme.title: Daybreak'ing News
programme.desc: With correspondents stationed around the world, Space Channel News covers every aspect of the space industry, from the latest mission, groundbreaking innovation, or a major news event. Duration: 7200

programme.title: AFTER DARK
programme.desc: If so, AFTER DARK is for you. Join Walter Lloyd on an intimate tour of the cosmos, right from your bed...at night. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Space Dealers: Risk Taking, Money Making
programme.desc: Torie and Larry duke it out on the auction floor for an incredible artefact – the flight control manual used by the Apollo 9 team. This ‘instruction manual’ is a piece of space history, but with both dealers keen to win, will one of them end up paying too much? And Cole meets astronaut Scott Parazynski who risked his life on one of the most daring spacewalks ever. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel News
programme.desc: News from around the space industry, around the globe....and so much more. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Dominion
programme.desc: In five days the world changed. As a retired Intelligence agent turned UFO investigator races to discover the fate of the human race, an alien observer searches for the human woman he loves. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Kronos
programme.desc: Aliens from another world send a huge robotic accumulator to invade the Earth. It absorbs all energy it comes in contact with. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Welcome to Space Channel Universe! Bringing you the highlights of latest news, entertainment, launch coverage and so much more! Sit back and enjoy Space Channel Universe. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Force of Impact
programme.desc: The sky is literally falling in this thriller. As one of the nation's leading astronomers, Madison Kelsey believes she is tracking a huge rogue asteroid rocketing toward earth. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Monolith Monsters
programme.desc: Rocks from a meteor grows and threatens a sleepy Southwestern desert community. It must be stopped or Los Angeles is in big trouble! Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Tourist - The First Space Hotel
programme.desc: Space Tourist takes us out of this world to a company making plans to build a hotel in space as well as those closer to home. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Dealers : Dealers on a Mission
programme.desc: Larry takes on an impossible mission: he’s been asked find an item worn in space by Apollo 15 legend Al Worden. It’s going to be tough but Larry is keen to succeed – if he pulls it off he gets to meet the great man himself. Torie searches for Russian space items for a museum in San Francisco. And Cole goes on the hunt for an item from Apollo 13 – his search takes him to Las Vegas and one of the biggest collectors in the space dealing world. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: It Came From Outer Space
programme.desc: A spaceship from another world crashes in the rural Arizona desert. An amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strange. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Monolith Monsters
programme.desc: Rocks from a meteor grows and threatens a sleepy Southwestern desert community. It must be stopped or Los Angeles is in big trouble! Duration: 5400

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: From an undisclosed bunker, Space Channel receives transmissions from our connections in deep space (and deep state). Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Universe
programme.desc: Join us as we travel through the Space Channel Universe and experience the Final Frontier like never before. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers : Money Trouble
programme.desc: In the world of space dealing everyone is having money trouble. Larry gets the offer of a lifetime: a Soviet era space suit. But there’s a problem – the price tag. To be in with a chance he has to clear stock and raise some dough. Torie pays big for an Apollo 11 artefact but it’s not what it seems – has she thrown away $10,000? And Cole meets Apollo 7 legend Walt Cunningham who shares memories of his time in space. Cole has money to spend – what he wants to know is will Walt part with any of his space items? Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: UFO Conclusion
programme.desc: What is the alien agenda? Why has the government gone to such great lengths to stifle the overwhelming evidence that otherworldly creatures exist? Some of our greatest minds unveil the truth behind this massive cover-up. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel's Captain's Lounge
programme.desc: A journey through space and time to discover the truth in all things, and our connection and rhythm with the Cosmos Duration: 7200
